item.title: Poker in Python
item.description: The poker game begins by prompting the user to input how many players will participate in the game. It then runs a loop that asks the user to enter the names of the players and adds these names to a list. A ard class is created that specify the card’s rank and suit. Another repr method helps format how the cards are presented. After a deck is created and cards are assigned to users, the game runs and the player with the highest value card wins.

item.title: Hello with Henry
item.description: Hello, this is my first post.
